an1.268-277:268.1.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to take any condition as permanent. That is not possible.
an1.268-277:268.1.2: But it is possible for an ordinary person to take some condition as permanent. That is possible.”
an1.268-277:269.1.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to take any condition as pleasant.
an1.268-277:269.1.2: But it is possible for an ordinary person to take some condition as pleasant.”
an1.268-277:270.1.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to take anything as self.
an1.268-277:270.1.2: But it is possible for an ordinary person to take something as self.”
an1.268-277:271.1.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to murder their mother.
an1.268-277:271.1.2: But it is possible for an ordinary person to murder their mother.”
an1.268-277:272.1.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to murder their father.
an1.268-277:272.1.2: But it is possible for an ordinary person to murder their father.”
an1.268-277:273.1.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to murder a perfected one.
an1.268-277:273.1.2: But it is possible for an ordinary person to murder a perfected one.”
an1.268-277:274.1.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to injure a Realized One with malicious intent.
an1.268-277:274.1.2: But it is possible for an ordinary person to injure a Realized One with malicious intent.”
an1.268-277:275.1.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to cause a schism in the Saṅgha.
an1.268-277:275.1.2: But it is possible for an ordinary person to cause a schism in the Saṅgha.”
an1.268-277:276.1.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to acknowledge another teacher.
an1.268-277:276.1.2: But it is possible for an ordinary person to acknowledge another teacher.”
an1.268-277:277.1.1: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for two perfected ones, fully awakened Buddhas to arise in the same solar system at the same time.
an1.268-277:277.1.2: But it is possible for just one perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha, to arise in one solar system.”
